item.title: By bus stop, 13th June
item.description:
Road works equipment has been left in the road for 2 months and has not been cleared away. It is by the bus stop and causes delays every day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Agincourt Road, Gospel Oak, London

item.title: Extremely overgrown hedge, 13th June
item.description:
The people living in this property are unfortunate, we've tried to tell them to cut the hedges, it's an ongoing issue for the past 6 years.... The last couple of months they have been sectioned by police and hackney NHS. We can't walk passed

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Darenth Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Westminster: can you do better than this?, 13th June
item.description:
The street cleaning situation gets worse every day. Residents dispose of their rubbish as they please, there is no where for the residents to dispose of their rubbish properly (grit bins?), and Westminster council is not bothered by the current situation. How much worse does it need to be for the council to act?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Boundary Road, Maida Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned trailer on Byne Road, 13th June
item.description:
Trailer has been on the road for some weeks - not a vehicle, not taxed. Blocking parking on the road for residents’ cars, which is always under pressure.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, Venner Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
